info.title: Rapidata Workflow API
info.description: The API for the Rapidata Workflow service

get.summary: Get the results for an evaluation workflow.

parameters.name: workflowId
parameters.description: The ID of the workflow to get the results for.

get.summary: Get the result overview for a multi ranking workflow.

parameters.name: workflowId
parameters.description: The ID of the workflow to get the results for.

get.summary: Get the result overview for a ranking workflow.

parameters.name: workflowId
parameters.description: The ID of the workflow to get the results for.

get.summary: Get the result overview for a simple workflow.

parameters.name: workflowId
parameters.description: The ID of the workflow to get the results for.

get.summary: Queries workflows based on the provided filter, page, and sort criteria.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: The model containing the filter, page, and sort criteria.

get.summary: Get a workflow by its ID.

parameters.name: workflowId
parameters.description: The ID of the workflow to get.

get.summary: Get the progress of a workflow.

parameters.name: workflowId
parameters.description: The ID of the workflow to get the progress for.

get.summary:
Calculates a summary of the results for a simple ranking workflow.
 The summary includes the number of times an asset at each index was the winner.

parameters.name: workflowId
parameters.description: The ID of the workflow to get the summary for.

parameters.name: useUserScore
parameters.description: Whether to use the user score to determine the winner.

get.summary:
Gets the limit most recent or oldest responses for a workflow.
 The responses are not guaranteed to be of any specific rapid.
 Instead, this endpoint returns all responses to any rapid in the workflow.

parameters.name: workflowId
parameters.description: The ID of the workflow to get the responses for.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of responses to get.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Whether the oldest or most recent responses should be returned.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the workflow to delete.

page.description: The size of the page and the page number to display.

states.description: An optional list of states to filter the rapids by.

sortCriteria.description: A list of criteria to sort the results by.

GetEvaluationWorkflowResultsModel.description: Model for getting the overview of a simple workflow result.

page.description: The size of the page and the page number to display.

sortCriteria.description: A list of criteria to sort the results by.

GetRankingWorkflowResultsModel.description: Model for getting the overview of a ranking workflow result.

page.description: The size of the page and the page number to display.

states.description: An optional list of states to filter the rapids by.

sortCriteria.description: A list of criteria to sort the results by.

GetSimpleWorkflowResultsModel.description: Model for getting the overview of a simple workflow result.

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme

OAuth2.description: OAuth2 authorization header using the Bearer scheme
